name: On the Island of Falling Stars [Chapter 1]
name_original: On the Island of Falling Stars [Chapter 1]
description:
As another hazy summer begins on the small island of Cóiméad, strange rumors start to circulate about the end of the world.

The first chapter of On the Island of Falling Stars covers three friends' search for the source of these rumors and what truth they may hold.

It is a short visual novel that should not take longer than 30 minutes to complete; in addition, keep in mind that it only encompasses the first section of the story & will be supplemented with a second chapter soon. 

Thank you very much. I really hope that you enjoy this visual novel if you do decide to play through it. :-) 

Although I've had a few people beta-test it before, it's certainly possible that errors slip through. Please let me know if you encounter any errors with the music, dialogue, or screens at my tumblr @yurucamp. Thanks!
